attributes.action: Paul O'Grady should be given a posthumous Knighthood for his services to charity
attributes.additional_details:
In Honor 🎖 of Mr Paul O'Grady who touched the hearts of everyone he meet, be it on 2 legs or 4! 
To show the love & appreciation that the nation has for the great man and to recognise the great things he achieved. 
To many he should have been Honoured years ago and he did so much for many, this is something the nation can do for him.
attributes.background: For years the general public have been voicing their opinion that Mr Paul O'Grady should be made a Sir for his outstanding work for Animal Welfare and Children's charities ! It's a travesty that he has died without this happening. We the people of the UK would like it awarded posthumously!
